frameDefinitions: A Theme is held in captivity by an Agent or Cause.
An Agent initiates the beginning of an ongoing Activity in which he will be continuously involved. ''
The Authorities hold a Suspect under suspicion of having committed a crime (Charges).
This frame contains words for individuals, i.e. humans, who are governed by virtue of being registered in a certain Jurisdiction.
A Member is semi-permanently part of a socially constructed Group.
This frame has to do with people (the Residents) residing in Locations, sometimes with a Co-resident.
frameExamples: Twenty soldiers were in <t>captivity</t> for over a month before they were released
At the same time, city-states <t>began</t> to grow in influence on the southern Greek mainland.
The police <t>held</t> Mr. Smith in the slammer on charges of killing his lawyer.
Victor is <t>part</t> of the Red Crescent
listRoleDefinitions: The entity which is confined.
The area within which the <fen>Theme</fen> is confined.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Theme</fen> is held captive.
This role identifies the general <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Theme</fen> is held captive.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> that an <fen>Agent</fen> starts.
This role identifies the being that starts the intentional <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> starts an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> starts an <fen>Activity</fen>.
The <fen>Authorities</fen> hold the <fen>Suspect</fen> in custody.
This role identifies the person who is taken into custody and held, under suspicion of having committed a crime.
When the detaining occurs.
Where the detaining takes place.
The <fen>Person</fen> is the human being.
The person who belongs to a <fen>Group</fen>.
A set of people standing in a semi-permanent relationship together.
The time at which the <fen>Member</fen> is a member of the <fen>Group</fen>.
The location where the membership relationship holds.
The individual(s) that reside at the <fen>Location</fen>.
The place in which somebody resides.
A person or group of people that the resident is staying with or among.
This role refers to the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Resident</fen> resides.
listRoleExamples: <fex>He</fex> was in captivity for six days.
The captives <fex>in the next room</fex> were fed well but otherwise ignored.
Two <fex>members</fex> of the Red Cross were here about a donation

passageCandidateSpans.text: Wikileaks Memoir of a child kidnapped to Guantanamo Bay
Human Rights First; Habeas Works: Federal Courts' Proven Capacity to Handle Guantánamo Cases
Orders Release of Guantánamo's Forgotten Child Andy Worthington
